summary: The module defines a foundational material framework for neural radiance field (NeRF) rendering, offering an abstract base class for shared material behavior and a concrete implementation that selects among multiple shading modes and computes the forward pass on input features.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to incorporate customizable shading and material handling into NeRF pipelines, improving visual fidelity for applications such as virtual reality, gaming, and 3D content creation.
